when you come to SUNY Old Westbury
you've got white black Latino Asian but
you've got everybody else also you've

but I also want to attract from around

the poor white person and the poor black

we're in the same boat

broken families trying to make mortgages
work
same thing that poor black people are

that's the commonality that's what made

we found the common ground
